StoryDescriptor: A poll was conducted by a private group in the South Region of the Kingdom at one of the busiest marketplaces. Of those who were able to take the survey, almost 80% rated the King equal to or worse than the previous king.
OutcomeDescriptor: There was no proof to this claim, but according to new reports your focus on the issue has caused your ratings to drop.
StoryTitle: The King's ratings are at an all-time low.
ShortOutcomeDescriptor: There was no proof to this claim, but according to new reports your focus on the issue has caused your ratings to drop.
EventSummary: You poured large amounts of attention and resources into investigating this issue, making sure it was not of ill-intent. One of the neighbouring kingdoms caught wind of this and took the opportunity to attack you while your guard was down.
